name: Thystle
storyline: "Thystle" is the name of a massive world tree that holds multiple realms on its many branches. Within these realms reside numerous inhabitants including but not limited to: Humans, Aesir, Demons, Draeven, Giants, Vaelyr, Dragons, and Djinn. The focus of the game will be the interactions of three competing factions - the Aesir, the Meraki, and the Drun.
summary: Thystle is a pixel art Real Time Strategy game (RTS) that is inspired by the classics of the genre - Warcraft 2, Age of Empires, and Starcraft.
